item.title: Report X-2025020668
item.description:
Report X-2025020668

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-17T21:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-05
  • City: CORTLAND
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE DUE TO THE SOUND OF AEROSOL CANS RATTLING IN THE PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THREE AEROSOL CANS OF CUSTOM FILL URETHANE, EACH AT 8.4 OZ. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report E-2025020208
item.description:
Report E-2025020208

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-17T21:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-15
  • City: MONTGOMERY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0548 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XNW. It was reported that approximately 1/2 gallon of Graphene Oxide Ceramic Spray Coating was released from two 55-gallon metal drum due to improper packaging by the shipper. (leaked on top of the drum only). The drums have been moved to the OS&D area until inventory is available. The release impacted the top of the drums at the lids. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning up the release with PPE available on-site. Called Infotrac and spoke to Bud. Report #20250115-381041.
